comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11

After upgrading to Firefox 4 Beta 11 I'm unable to post message in Diaspora (joindiaspora.com).

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to joindiaspora.com
2. Enter some status message in text field under "What's in your mind?" label
3. Click on Share button
Actual Results:  
A Diaspora popup comes stating "Failed to Post Message"

Expected Results:  
Status message update should be successful

Status message update was happening successfully till Firefox 4.0 beta 10 after the upgrade this issue came into picture.
